MS MCQs

    Put items away in the warehouse in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. Which of the following statements about the warehouse put-away is true?

      You can change the bin of the Take lines.

      You can only change the bin of the Place line if the item on the line has no fixed bin.

      With the Split Line function, you can create two Place lines for one Take line.

      If you deleted a Place line, the program automatically deletes the associated Take line.


    2. What can you use the put-away worksheet for?

      To create one warehouse put-away document for multiple warehouse receipts

      To directly put away items for multiple warehouse receipts

      To replenish items from the bulk zone to the pick zone

      To calculate a forecast of the put-aways, based on a date formula
